Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Anti-Semitism \An`ti-Sem"i*tism\, n. Opposition to, or hatred of, Semites, esp. Jews. The word is sometimes also applied to acts motivated by or evincing antisemitism. -- {An`ti-Sem"ite}, n. -- {An`ti-Sem*it"ic}, a. [Webster 1913 Suppl. +PJC]
anti-semitic adj 1: relating to or characterized by anti-Semitism; hating Jews 2: discriminatory especially on the basis of race or religion [syn: {racist}, {antiblack}, {anti-Semite(a)}]
